purpose: To outline fraud rules and their implementation strategies.
title: Fraud Strategy Management

bullets.text: Will decline or refer transaction at the point of sale
Should be utilized on riskiest activity
Recommended that activity qualifying for real-time also be eligible for automated alerts (cardholder outreach)
First transaction will approve, then a block is automatically placed on the account to decline subsequent transactions
Depending on system capability, tiered blocks can be created to only decline certain transaction types and potentially approve low risk activity
Recommended that activity qualifying for approve and block also be eligible for automated alerts (cardholder outreach)
Activity triggers medium concern; fraud analyst to manually review and determine if block and cardholder outreach is warranted
Activity qualifying for approve and queue rules may also be eligible for automated alerts (cardholder outreach), depending on issuer contact strategy
